Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting Detailsok at around 5 20 am i went out for a smoke. i see what looks like a worm hole and then a light comes through it. it stops once its through the circular like hole. then it starts to move slowly north. it gets to probably a half mile away, i can now see that it is very very large, the size of 4 jets stacked on top of each other and probably twice as long. it has 3 seperate red lights that strobe, and a 2 or 3 bright white flood lights. i wish i had a better camera, one that can take very bright video during night time, and one that can zoom, and focus manually. i have seen many ufo's at this house. this is not the first, second, or third this year. i seen a ufo a few nights ago, 6 hours after the fireball happend in north dakota. this event that happened tonight, would of been visible from grand rapids by 5:40 am
